text: Wu zhenpingshiju er zhenglun an la de qishi zhe, tamen de xiongzhong que youyi zhong aoqi [bu yuan chengren mu sheng shi an la de shizhe he “gulanjing” shi an la de yanyu deng], tamen jue buneng shixian [tamen de yuwang]. Yinci, ni dang qiu an la baohu [mian zao jiao'ao zi da zhe de qinhai]. Ta [an la] que shi quan wen de, quan shi de.
